concept.title: Logging in a high availability environment
concept.shortdesc: In a High Availability (HA) environment, log location and syslog configuration objects do not get replicated from primary node to standby.

section.title: Setting up logging in a high availability environment
section.p: To set up logging in a high availability (HA) environment, you must configure syslog and log location information on both the primary and the standby node by using REST APIs. For more information about configuring syslog, see . For more information about configuring log location, see .
